name: WordPress Contact Form, Drag and Drop Form Builder Plugin – Live Forms
author: W3 Eden, Inc.

sections.description:
WordPress Live Forms Plugin is an elegant way to build and manage any type of form simply using Drag and Drop Method. You want to build a contact form, subscription form, donation/fundraising form, client review form, payment form, a form for managing your product support section, Live Form – Visual Form Builder Plugin could be a best choice for you. Live Forms – Visual Form Builder plugin also will give you the capability to assign and manage support agent to each of your forms. Agents can manage and reply support ticket from front-end easily without any admin access.

LiveForms Overview

Features

  • Visual Builder
  • Multi-column responsive form layout
  • Multi-page/Multi-step form ( Demo )
  • Extensive Data Validation ( Browser / Pre-Defined Dataset / Remote )
  • Detailed From Stats/Analytics
  • Form Entries
  • Inline Reply option for contact requests
  • Lots of Actions and Filters Hooks to increase its extendability
  • Gutenberg Ready
  • Elementor Ready
  • Conditional Logic ( PRO )
  • Captcha Protection ( PRO )
  • File upload ( PRO )
  • Accept Payment with payment field ( PRO )
  • Build awesome donation/fundraising form easily ( PRO )
  • Support Form with support agent assignment option ( PRO )
  • Offer free download on form submission ( PRO )
  • Zapier Integration ( PRO )

Common Form Fields

  • Name
  • Email
  • Subject
  • Message

Generic Form Fields

  • Text
  • Textarea
  • Number
  • Radio
  • Select
  • Checkbox
  • Date
  • Time

Advanced Form Fields ( PRO ONLY )

  • File Upload
  • Math Captcha
  • ReCaptcha
  • Full Name
  • Address
  • Star Rating
  • URL
  • Paragraph Text
  • Phone
  • Payment ( PayPal )
  • Location
  • Hidden
  • Password
  • Free Download
  • Range Control
  • Signature
  • Rating
  • Likert
  • Space

For More Details Please check WPLiveForms.com

Premium Addons

  • WordPress Posts
  • MailChimp Connect
  • Aweber Connect
  • Active Campaign Connect
  • Campaign Monitor Connect
  • WordPress Signin Form
  • WordPress Signup Form
  • Data Export
  • Email Template Editor
  • Webhooks
  • Survey Form – Show Survey Results
  • Stripe – Payment Option
  • 2Checkout – Payment Option

Check LiveForms Add-Ons for more features and options
sections.installation:
1. Upload liveforms to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

sections.reviews:
Free Form Builder Plugin

By sagarbarua on April 25, 2023

I was searching for a form builder plugin for my wordpress website for a few months now which is free but provides some great useful features. Found out about liveforms and it’s the one. Thank you.

Excellent. Reduced a lot of work and saved my time.

By kaziasif on October 10, 2022

Liveforms has been a great help on my website journey. Their pre-built templates saved a lot of time. Also, reduced my work. Best form builder plugin i know. Highly recommended.

Excellent Forms Builder Platform

By Shaifuddin (shaifuddin) on August 25, 2022

It has a lot of amazing core features and easy to use.

Great Plugin. Simple and easy to use

By paul j ricks (paulricks) on August 16, 2022

Live Forms is a great wordpress form builder plugin. It has helped me a lot on my wordpress journey, mostly with their pre-built form templates. This saved a lot of time which increased my productivity on my career. Recommended.

Straight forward, easy to use, well designed!

By Christian Leuenberg (cleuenberg) on January 14, 2021

Live Forms is a pretty easy to use form builder plugin. Drag and drop your form fields, setup mail sending and embed via shortcode. The backend editor is really well-designed and pretty straight forward.

Great

By iso9001facil on January 12, 2021

Easy to use.

Great features to easily build forms

By b2brett on January 11, 2021

The interface for building and configuring forms is the most user-friendly I have seen, much easier and feature-filled than Contact Form 7.

Great Plugin with drop form builder

By Panorade on January 10, 2021

Great Plugin with god and easy to use drag and drop form builder

Great plugin, what I was looking for

By Esteban88 on January 9, 2021

I was looking for a simple and easy to configure forms plugin, I found it on Live Forms :)

Realy great

By resiti on January 9, 2021

State of the art plugin !

short_description: WordPress Live Forms - Easy Drag and Drop Form Builder Plugin for WordPress, is an elegant way to build and manage any type of form.

WordPress Live Forms Plugin is an elegant way to build and manage any type of form simply using Drag and Drop Method. You want to build a contact form, subscription form, donation/fundraising form, client review form, payment form, a form for managing your product support section, Live Form – Visual Form Builder Plugin could be a best choice for you.
